scripts.fetch:webview2: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if(-not (Test-Path 'tools')){ New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'tools' | Out-Null }; try { Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=2124703' -OutFile 'tools\MicrosoftEdgeWebView2RuntimeInstallerX64.exe' -UseBasicParsing -ErrorAction Stop } catch { Write-Host 'Failed to download WebView2 bootstrapper'; exit 0 }"
scripts.wpf:sync: npm run build && powershell -NoProfile -Command "if(-not (Test-Path 'WPF_APP/wwwroot')){ New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'WPF_APP/wwwroot' | Out-Null }; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'WPF_APP/wwwroot/*' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Copy-Item -Path 'dist/*' -Destination 'WPF_APP/wwwroot' -Recurse -Force"
scripts.package:win: npm run wpf:sync && npm run fetch:webview2 && dotnet publish WPF_APP -c Release -r win-x64 -p:PublishSingleFile=false && "C:\Program Files (x86)\Inno Setup 6\ISCC.exe" installer.iss
